Establish.origin: [we the people of the United States…do ordain and this Constitution " U.S. Constitution preamble"]

1.definition: to institute (as a law) permanently by enactment or agreement [we the people of the United States…do ordain and this Constitution "preamble"]

3.definition: to bring into existence[Congress shall have power…to post offices and post roads "art. I"]to found (a national bank) pursuant to a charter

4.definition: to make (a church) a national or state institution see also,

6.definition: to place in a position of being accepted or followed [a ruleby case law]
